title: What are the best country songs about love? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some of the best love songs ever written are country songs, so that’s one tough cookie. I’ll try to compilate a list based on my personal musical taste only, but as it’s clearly a subjective standard anyone is free to disagree. 1. I Will Always Love You - Dolly Parton 2. Crazy - Patsy Cline 3. You Were Always on My Mind - Willie Nelson 4. Stand By Your Man - Tammy Wynette 5. Forever and Ever, Amen - Randy Travis 6. Hello Darlin' - Conway Twitty 7. She Believes in Me - Kenny Rogers 8. Golden Ring - George Jones & Tammy Wynette 9. How Do I Live - LeAnn Rimes10. Kiss an Angel Good Morning - Charley Pride11. Sweet Dreams (Of You) - Patsy Cline12. Behind Closed Doors - Charlie Rich13. Unanswered Prayers - Garth Brooks14. I Cross My Heart - George Strait15. He Stopped Loving Her Today - George Jones16. I Can't Stop Loving You - Ray Charles17. When You Say Nothing at All - Keith Whitley18. That's the Way Love Goes - Merle Haggard19. Lady - Kenny Rogers20. It's Your Love - Tim McGraw (with Faith Hill) Enjoy!

That's a loaded question. How many country songs are there about love? I think everyone has ones that affect them in different ways. What some might like. Others may not. I have been emotional affected by Keith Urban song “ l told you so” . It always affects me. My wife may have left me. But l will always love her. Though she doesn't admit it. Both her and our son need me. I'm always here for them. This is my story. Because love doesn't judge or have conditions. Love is love. You give it expecting nothing. You just give it. Sure I'm a fool to others. But l know they appreciate it. Even if it is never shown. Thanks …l hope you like that song.
